name: vtl-programming-guide
description: VTL is a logical template language, giving us power to manipulate both the request and the response in the  standard request/response flow of a web application using techniques such as: - Default values for new items - Input validation and formatting - Transforming and shaping data - Iterating over lists, maps, and arrays to pluck out or alter values - Filter/change responses based on user identity - Complex authorization checks
